Woodcut or acquire from Managing Miscellania and burn on a bonfire.
Woodcut or acquire from Managing Miscellania and burn on a bonfire. Your Kingdom can fairly easily get you enough maple logs passively have some spare.
Disassembling Acadia logs for Simple components is recommended as they only have a ~4% junk chance.
Woodcut or acquire from Managing Miscellania and burn on a bonfire.

Woodcut or acquire from boss drops like Croesus , Nex and Wilderness Flash Events , and burn on a bonfire. This can also be continued until later levels if you no longer have uses for them in fletching and construction .

'Accidental' Firemaking methods are excellent especially for ironmen as they allow them to train Firemaking while producing useful items ( sharp shell shard , tempered fungal shaft , and dinosaur 'propellant' ) without requiring resource input. The only hurdle is the grandmaster quest Extinction requirement.

- Location: Jadinko Lair - 83 Woodcutting Requirement - 378.5 Firemaking xp per Curly Root - Chop from curly jade roots hanging from the ceiling. - Burn the roots in the nearby firepits. At minimum 83 woodcutting level, Nature's Sentinel with a Ring of Fire: - 250,000 Firemaking xp/h - 70,000 Woodcutting xp/h At high levels with full Nature's Sentinel, and the Ring of Fire: - 305,000 Firemaking xp/h - 90,000 Woodcutting xp/h - Additional Rewards: ~1,100 Jadinko favor/h

At high levels once you reach it's beneficial to stop using the Nature's sentinel outfit in favor or the Flame gloves , and Ring of Fire , and either use Superheat form or the Always adze relic: - 670,000 Firemaking xp/h - 120,000 Woodcutting xp/h - No Jadinko favor
